name: cvr-data-update
description: CVR lambda triggered by upload to S3 bucket. Used to download csv file from S3 bucket, parse downloaded data and insert it into the database

scripts.build: npm prune && npm install ../common && npm install && npm run lint && npm test && npm run prod
scripts.prod: npm prune --production && npm install ../common --production && npm install --production && zip -r ../cvr-data-update.zip * --exclude /src/test
